Key Match Events: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout
Garrett Mitchell homered for the Brewers
William Contreras stole home during the third inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The NL Central-leading Brewers (77-56) won two of three from the Giants
The Giants (67-68) went 2-4 on a six-game trip to fall below.500
Others: The Brewers scored two runs in the second off Hayden Birdsong
Milwaukee then capitalized on some aggressive baserunning to make it 3-0 in the third
Civale (5-8) worked seven innings for his longest outing of the season
The Giants went 0 for 4 with runners in scoring position
